H0.text: Carbon dioxide and water are the two products released when a plant breaks down sugar to generate energy.

H1.text: Oxygen and carbon dioxide are the two things produced when a plant breaks down sugar to release energy.

H2.text: Carbon dioxide and food are the two things produced when a plant breaks down sugar to release energy.

H3.text: Oxygen and food are produced when a plant breaks down sugar to release energy.

A4.text: The products of this process are carbon dioxide and water

A5.text: Two low-energy waste products, H2O and CO2, are created during this cycle
